statements: SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_id = 1;

SELECT review_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT review_id, review_text, review_date FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_id = 1

SELECT review_text, review_date FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY review_date ASC

SELECT review_text, review_date FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, review_text, review_date FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE result_id IN (1,2,3);
SELECT review_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_reviews JOIN sentiment_analysis_results ON customer_reviews.review_id = sentiment_analysis_results.review_id;

SELECT * FROM customer_reviews JOIN sentiment_analysis_results ON customer_reviews.review_id = sentiment_analysis_results.review_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM sentiment_analysis_results GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.7;
